Text:
Yh, thanx for this.  It's the exact same map, only someone has wasted their time scattering the whole place with snow.  Doesn't really fit in with the whole beach/palm trees/turtles thing that's going on!

Anyway, I'm sure the guy who made (?) this is really chuffed with himself, so thanx for the effort, and thanx for the up McBanaroo.
great man :D guys download the crysis editor works with the demo theres more stuff u can dig out of it then just the demo :D
